title: Quest for the Hidden Crown
description: An Epic Adventure that will have young readers hooked page by page.This is the first book in the Animal Kingdom Chronicles series. The stories, characters and adventures are based in a time where animals roamed a Kingdom named Animarian. But these animals were not as we know them today. From a time long forgotten these animals walked and talked like we humans do today. From a medieval setting this book joins the story at the point of two young white tigers that are thrown into a quest and adventure to save a kingdom they did not even realize they lived in and did not know about.They learn many truths about themselves and those around them that they thought they knew. Facing their fears, confronting new unexpected challenges and succeeding against all odds are just some of the elements they must face.
author: B.M. O'Brien
